name: CYBER VR
description: It is a multiplayer dynamic shooter in virtual reality with high-quality graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
